title: IIT BHU Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Project Scientist Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Varanasi (IIT BHU) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Scientist posts. Those candidates who have qualified for a Ph.D. can grab this chance and apply for the IIT BHU Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. ...
